EmailTemplate.name: LA Dodgers 9/11/13 final reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Let's go Dodgers
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
Isn't the view great? I don't mean from the stadium, I mean from the top of the standings.
Well, I just wanted to make sure that you all had the information on tonights game(Copied below).
Here is the down and dirty, I will be in LOT B with the rest of the IAVA staff at 5PM with your tickets. Game starts at 7:10PM and our check in table will be closed by 8PM. Please be sure to stop by and say hi - and get your tickets. Go Dodgers!
Cheers, Matt
Matt Colvin, USAF Strategic Partnerships Senior Associate Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
Forwarded message From: Team IAVA Subject: IAVA-Miller High Life Los Angeles Dodgers vs Arizona Diamondbacks Game, 9/11
Dear IAVA Member:
If you are receiving this message, you were final confirmed for the IAVA-Miller High Life Los Angeles Dodgers vs. Arizona Diamondbacks Game taking place on Wednesday, September 11. Details of the day are below:
What: Los Angeles Dodgers vs Arizona Diamondbacks When: Wednesday, September 11, 7:10 p.m.; check-in and parking lots open at 5:10 p.m.; Gates open at 5:40 p.m. Where: Dodger Stadium - 1000 Elysian Park Ave Los Angeles, CA 90012
Logistics Driving Directions Parking Map Seating Map of Dodger Stadium
Tickets Check in for IAVA members and their guests will be in parking Lot B. We recommend entering Dodger Stadium at Sunset Gate A. Recommended parking lots are Lot F (preferred - $35); Lot 2 (general - $10); and Lot 12 (general - $10). You will see the giant Miller High Life inflatable bottles. IAVA representatives will be on hand to check in guests and to distribute tickets.
Questions & Cancellations If you have any questions or your plans have changed and you can no longer attend the game, please email rucksack@iava.org to let us know.
Thank you and have a great time at the game! Best, Team IAVA
